title: Today was a great Birthday
body:
I had breakfast with my family, they behaved and got me some useful stuff. I also went on a road trip with my dad to return a Barnes and Nobles Book, it was unsuccessful but we had fun.

I went rock climbing in a new place today.
I expected more rock climbing but I was super tuckered out after 2 hours of 50 feet above ground rope obstacle course marathons. It was extremely exciting to climb around suspended rope courses and do stuff I never thought I could such as climbing a rope upside down with my legs or zip lining.

I also made a new friend at the post climbing party! Today has been an awesome birthday :D
